display_long_description:
"The Line" is great to showcase VR for first-time users. This award winning experience is a 15-20 minute interactive story about love and fear of change, allowing you to unlock an enchanted miniature model of two miniature dolls, Pedro and Rosa. Set within a scale model of 1940s São Paulo city in Brazil, this amazing VR narrative invites you to pull on knobs and even crawl under the machinery to unfold the story of these figurines who are perfect for each other but reluctant to live out their love.

- WINNER - 2020 Primetime Emmy® Award for Outstanding Innovation in Interactive Media.
- WINNER - Best VR Experience at 76th Venice International Film Festival.

Narration in English, Portuguese, Korean, and simplified Chinese. SDH Subtitles in English, Portuguese, Korean, Japanese, French, Spanish, German, and simplified Chinese.
